data.text: Help Rafay clean his room. Listen to the instructions. Click on the objects lying around and drag them to the correct places.
data.question1: Put the shirt in the cupboard.
Put the pillow on the bed.
Put the toy car in the toy chest.
Put the pieces of paper in the bin.
Put the jeans in the drawer.
Put the shoes in the cupboard.
Put the pencils in the holder.
Pick up the chair and put it in its right place.
data.feedback: Oh no! That's not the right place!

Thank you!
You are a great help!
